verbose_text: In contrast, in the absence of UG26 cells or UG26 CM or NGF plus Col 1, even full maintenance of ESLAM (and hence HSC) survival and mitogenesis (as could be achieved by exposure to FBS plus SF plus IL-3 plus IL-6 plus Epo) was not sufficient to prevent a rapid and significant loss of DSR activity.
evidence: HSC) survival and mitogenesis (as could be achieved by exposure to FBS plus SF plus IL-3 plus IL-6 plus Epo) was not sufficient to prevent a rapid and significant loss of DSR
